mapper.sql: ID, news_id, audit_status, audit_result, publish_status, reject_status, report_status
mapper.insert: insert into news_manage (ID, news_id, audit_status, audit_result, publish_status, reject_status, report_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
news_id,

mapper.update:
update news_manage
news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_result = #{auditResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_status = #{publishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reject_status = #{rejectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update news_manage set news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_result = #{auditResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_status = #{publishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_status = #{rejectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from news_manage where audit_status="N"
select count(*) from news_manage where audit_status="Y" and audit_result="Y" and publish_status="N"
select count(*) from news_manage where audit_status="Y" and audit_result="N" and reject_status="N"
select nd.*,nm.*,m.user_name from news_detail as nd ,news_manage as nm,media as m where nm.audit_status = "N" and nm.news_id = nd.ID and m.media_id = nd.media_id order by nd.submit_Date
mapper.update: update news_manage set audit_status = "Y", audit_result = "Y" where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update news_manage set audit_status = "Y", audit_result = "N" where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update news_manage set publish_status = "Y" where news_id = #{ID} AND audit_status = "Y" AND audit_result = "Y"
update news_manage set reject_status = "Y" where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND audit_status = "Y" AND audit_result = "N"
mapper.select: select nd.*,nm.*,m.user_name from news_detail as nd ,news_manage as nm,media as m where nm.report_status = "Y" and nm.news_id = nd.ID and m.media_id = nd.media_id order by nd.submit_Date

select nd.*,nm.*,m.user_name from news_detail as nd ,news_manage as nm,media as m where nm.audit_status = "Y" and nm.audit_result = "Y" and nm.publish_status = "N" and nm.news_id = nd.ID and m.media_id = nd.media_id order by nd.submit_Date

select nd.*,nm.*,m.user_name from news_detail as nd ,news_manage as nm,media as m where nm.audit_status = "Y" and nm.audit_result = "N" and nm.news_id = nd.ID and m.media_id = nd.media_id and reject_status = "N" order by nd.submit_Date
